casebody.data:
[Cite as 07/30/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-3957.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

July 30, 2003

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

2003-0924. State ex rel. Sloan v. Crott.

In Mandamus. On complaint in mandamus of Marshall Sloan. On S.Ct.Prae.R. X(5) determination, cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton and O’Donnell, JJ., concur. O’Connor, J., would grant an alternative writ.
